Simulator.Name: ChemistryTemp
Simulator.Description: Data received from Matthias Ihme (mihme@stanford.edu) on Feb 20, 2007 This is the data as used for the publication: Generation of optimal artificial neural networks using a pattern search algorithm: application to approximation of chemical systems - Accepted for publication in Neural Computation: Jan. 16, 2007 The data only contains the Temperature, not the chemical source term, see Chemistry.xml for the full data.
